job_tasks.phrase: You proactively work with teams to implement these solutions across the organization.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of developed solutions into the broader organizational systems, a core software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: As a cloud solution engineer, you will be partnering with Data Analysts and Customer Journey Experts (CJE) to design and implement Google Cloud Native infrastructure for the use of leading-edge conversational AI products, such as a compliant generative AI chatbot.
job_tasks.justification: This sentence clearly outlines the design and implementation of infrastructure for AI products, which falls under software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: As a Cloud Engineer, you understand business needs, can architect GCP cloud solutions, understand data needs, and can inform on using the right cloud solutions to operationalize the conversational platform and thus increase ING contact center agents' efficiencies.
job_tasks.justification: Architecting cloud solutions and operationalizing platforms are key software engineering responsibilities, focusing on the delivery and integration of technical systems.

job_tasks.phrase: You can with the GCP APIs and code pipelines to support the team's needs.
job_tasks.justification: Coding pipelines and interacting with APIs are fundamental software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: You can productize and operationalize (GCP) cloud-native applications for production environments.
job_tasks.justification: Productizing and operationalizing applications for production is a direct software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Implementation and productionalization of cloud solutions using Generative AI and LLM technologies.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the implementation and productionalization of solutions, which is a core software engineering task, even though it involves AI technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Making cloud designs and technical decisions for conversational systems projects at ING Analytics.
job_tasks.justification: Designing and making technical decisions for systems is a software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow.
job_tasks.justification: Creating data pipelines, especially those interacting with specific platforms like DialogFlow, falls under the operational and infrastructure management aspect of MLOps/LLMOps.
Implementing ML architectures within a cloud platform relates to the operationalization and infrastructure management of ML systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Implementing Looker Dashboards, BigQuery datasets/views, and working with Vertex AI Search and Conversation API.
job_tasks.justification: Implementing data infrastructure components like dashboards, datasets, and interacting with specific AI APIs (Vertex AI) is part of operationalizing and managing the ML/AI ecosystem.

job_tasks.phrase: Writing code to interact with GCP API's.
job_tasks.justification: Writing code to interact with APIs, especially in a cloud context, is related to building and managing the operational aspects of systems.
Automating bottlenecks is a task focused on improving operational efficiency and system performance.

job_tasks.phrase: As a cloud solution engineer, you will be partnering with Data Analysts and Customer Journey Experts (CJE) to design and implement Google Cloud Native infrastructure for the use of leading-edge conversational AI products, such as a compliant generative AI chatbot.
job_tasks.justification: Partnering with other roles like Data Analysts and CJE to design solutions implies understanding business needs and aligning technical capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: As a Cloud Engineer, you understand business needs, can architect GCP cloud solutions, understand data needs, and can inform on using the right cloud solutions to operationalize the conversational platform and thus increase ING contact center agents' efficiencies.
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly states the need to understand business needs and translate them into technical solutions to improve efficiency.

job_tasks.phrase: Your mission will be to ensure the improvement of our products with a team and supporting all ING countries in reaching their targets by providing smart advanced analytics solutions, to strengthen ING leadership in digitalization & support our 40 million customers.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the strategic goal of improving products, supporting country targets, and strengthening leadership through analytics, indicating a need for business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Advice on which Google Cloud Platform products to use.
job_tasks.justification: Providing advice on technology choices based on project needs implies an understanding of both business requirements and technical capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Contributing to strengthening the cloud capability within the team.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding the team's current capabilities and strategizing on how to improve them, which requires business and team understanding.

soft_skills.phrase: You proactively work with teams to implement these solutions across the organization.
soft_skills.justification: Working proactively with teams indicates collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: You will be partnering with Data Analysts and Customer Journey Experts (CJE) to design and implement Google Cloud Native infrastructure...
soft_skills.justification: Partnering with other experts implies collaboration and communication.

soft_skills.phrase: You will work collaboratively with an extended group of stakeholders, including global and local Retail Contact Center teams.
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly mentions working collaboratively with stakeholders.

soft_skills.phrase: inform on using the right cloud solutions
soft_skills.justification: Informing others about technical solutions requires communication skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Contributing to strengthening the cloud capability within the team.
soft_skills.justification: Contributing to team capabilities implies collaboration and knowledge sharing.
Identifying and automating bottlenecks is a problem-solving task.
Creating innovative solutions suggests a drive for innovation.

soft_skills.phrase: productize and operationalize (GCP) cloud-native applications for production environments.
soft_skills.justification: Productizing and operationalizing applications implies taking ownership of the delivery process.

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes software engineering tasks related to designing, implementing, and operationalizing cloud-native infrastructure and applications (Macro-Category A). While it mentions Generative AI and LLM technologies, the focus is on building and managing the systems that *use* these technologies, rather than the core development or fine-tuning of the models themselves (Macro-Category B). The role involves partnering with other experts and understanding business needs to deliver these AI-powered solutions, fitting the profile of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the responsibilities, focusing on cloud infrastructure, application development, and operationalization of AI products. The technologies mentioned are specific, and the tasks align well with the defined categories, making the profile assignment straightforward.
